summary: This mod creates multiple Marriageable NPC\\\'s into the Skyrim world!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=6]*NO LONGER IN DEVELOPMENT*[/size][/color]


Have you ever wanted more Marriageable NPC\\\'s in Skyrim?

Have you ever wanted to be able to marry some NPC\\\'s without needing to complete a quest to earn their love?

Have you ever wanted to constantly be reminded of how great you are?

Well, this is the mod for you! This mod adds 10 New NPC\\\'s (And of course, more coming constantly) into the Skyrim World, that you are able to marry! And they come in different races including: Khajiit, Brenton, Nord, and more!

Each NPC comes with its own inventory to fit their clothing and accessories. There is a beggar that only has a few coins, and some drinks. A Rich girl who has lots of coins, and more!

Now, i would still consider this as a BETA, because there is a few bugs im still working out... So you are my testers!

I Hope you enjoy this mod, for i have spent lots of time on it!

(P.S. I have not seen a mod that has done something like this at all.... So, sorry if i did not give you \\\'Credit\\\' for the idea...)



[color=#00ff00][size=4]List of Current Characters[/size][/color]:

[color=#ffff00][size=4]Female[/size][/color]:

Nord Melissa Terrance, Main Part of Town
Nord Staphani Gold Whiterun, Outside of Dragonsreach
Nord Daniella Reddington Riften Merchants Circle
Khajiit Nicki Germanotta Riften Mistveil Keep
Brenton Kathy Redcastle Markarth Silver Blood Inn
Dark Elf Jessica Malberry Whiterun Belethors General Goods



[color=#00ffff][size=4]Male[/size][/color]:

Nord Joseph Glidewell Solitude
Nord Kale Wolf Riften Bee & Barb
Nord Matt Jericho Whiterun Bannedmore'
Khajiit Gale Castle Windhelm Palace of Kings
Brenton Terrance Greatsword College of Winterhold -- This NPC has not been tested
Wood Elf Miles Convington Dragon's Reach
